text: The United States is scheduled to compete at the 2022 Winter Olympics in Beijing, China, from 4 to 20 February 2022. == Ice hockey == The United States has qualified 25 male and 23 female competitors to the ice hockey tournaments as part of the country's two teams. ===Men's tournament=== The United States men's national ice hockey team qualified by being ranked 6th in the 2019 IIHF World Rankings. They will play in Group A. ===Women's tournament=== The United States women's national ice hockey team qualified by being ranked 1st in the 2020 IIHF World Rankings. They will play in Group A. ==References== Category:Nations at the 2022 Winter Olympics 2022 Winter Olympics
title: United States at the 2022 Winter Olympics
